title: Upcoming events
desc: Get to know the upcoming important dates and events in the life of the school. Each event is a new opportunity and a source of inspiration!
boxTitle: Opening ceremony of the new academic year
boxDesc: At Turan International School, each stage of the school year is enriched with important and meaningful events. Upcoming events are opportunities for our students to gain new experiences, showcase their talents, strengthen team spirit, and deepen cooperation with parents.
